text: Actinopteri is a group of fish. It is the sister taxon of Cladistia. They have a symplectic, a bone behind the upper part of the jaw that most fishes do not have. They have scales and ray fins, because they are part of the Actinopterygii class. == Related pages == * Chondrostei ==References== Category:Ray-finned fish
title: Actinopteri
